seo.title: Power Platform: 1-Hour Briefing
seo.description: Discuss your business challenges with SSW and discover how using Power Platform tools can streamline your processes and drive efficiency

topLabel.labelText: UNLOCK YOUR ORGANIZATIONâ€™S POTENTIAL WITH POWER PLATFORM

blocks.heading: Intelligent Automation
blocks.description:
Harness the Power of Low-Code Development for Your Business

Before starting your low-code development, it's important to grasp what Microsoft Power Platform can offer. SSW's Power Platform Assessment gives you a clear analysis and strategic roadmap, helping you make informed decisions on how to use these tools.

Our assessment service, also known as a Specification Review, focuses on understanding your business needs and exploring Power Platform solutions, with Azure integration for improved performance.

Our deliverables include:
Business Process Analysis: We examine your existing processes and workflows to identify opportunities for automation and optimization using Power Platform.\
Blueprint Creation\*\*: We create a comprehensive blueprint for your Power Platform solution, detailing the architecture, required components, and Azure integration points.\
Licensing and Governance Recommendations\*\*: We offer guidance on the most cost-effective licensing options and best practices for governing your Power Platform environment.\
Product Backlog Items with Effort/Time Estimates\*\*: We provide a feature list with effort estimates, allowing for accurate planning and budgeting, while accounting for potential timeframe changes based on project scope.\
Implementation Roadmap\*\*: We design an in-depth plan that outlines the steps necessary for successful Power Platform adoption, considering your business objectives and timelines.

\*Pricing varies based on the scope of the engagement. Licensing costs are additional to the engagement fees.
